body: 203978 is the "full version" of this story. It is 255 pages and includes a pretty vanilla intro with the boy getting into a relationship with the 3 women. Then there is a scene where the mom meets up with one of them in a hotel, but she does this to keep them from trying anything further with the others, and to buy time until they are arrested.
